title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Go-based tool that lets you pull, bundle, and run large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client library for the Ollama API, published on npm.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, installable from PyPI, supports streaming and chat.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama models, built with SvelteKit.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem that wraps Ollama endpoints for Rails apps, supports streaming.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Python CLI tool for interactive multi-turn chat sessions with Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration node to use Ollama models for generative QA and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strong typing, async enumerables, and NuGet package.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose files for running Ollama server plus GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU nodes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama-index to chat with local documents.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into channels via slash commands.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing TypeScript bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python developers to integrate Ollama models.

title: ollama-hnsw
summary: Lightweight Go microservice that adds vector similarity search on top of Ollama embeddings using hnswlib.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama with session memory and model selector.

title: ollama-kt
summary: Kotlin multiplatform client for Ollama supporting JVM, Android, and native targets.
